args.subject: Document Access Issue
args.body:
Dear Lily, 

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to let you know that I attempted to access the shared document you provided, but I encountered some issues with the link. Unfortunately, I couldn't download the document.

Please let me know if there's an alternative way to access it, and I would be happy to assist.

Thank you for your understanding!

Best regards, 
Emma Johnson

conversations.content: The email has been sent successfully.
